title: [cuda 5.0] windows binaries somewhere ?
body_html:
I am wondering if someone could post or point to where to get PyTorch Windows binaries supporting cuda 5.0. I do have a "not so old" Quadro M1000M (from a Thinkpad P50 bought less that 2 years ago!!!). I am not skilled enough to build on windows, so I was wondering if someone already did that and can post the binaries.
Thank you a lot
